```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
theme_set(theme_bw())
library(boot)
library(broom)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(tidy = FALSE,
                      fig.width = 6,
                      fig.height = 5)
```

```{r read}
titanic = read_csv(here::here("data/train.csv"), 
                 col_types = "dddccdddcdcc") 
startups = read_csv(here::here("data/50_Startups.csv"),
                 col_types = "dddcd")

titanic
startups

```


### Plots


```{r}
titanic %>%
    filter(Survived==1)%>%
    ggplot()+
    geom_bar(aes(x = Sex, fill = Sex))


```

```{r}
startups %>%
    ggplot()+
    geom_point(aes(x = Marketing, y = Profit, color = State))

```
